sentence.Network_en: If he is caught again he will be given a custodial sentence.

sentence.Network_en: Nothing other than an immediate custodial sentence could be justified.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有判决即时监禁才算合理。

entry.def: Custodial means relating to keeping people in prison.

entry.def: If a child's parents are divorced or separated, the custodial parent is the parent who has custody of the child.

means.word_mean: 1. providing protective supervision; watching over or safeguarding;

sentences.sentence: "daycare that is educational and not just custodial"
